reviews.text: Everything is delicious especially lemon pepper sauce üòã

Great Seafood boil in the neighborhood! Also, don‚Äôt miss out on their piping hot soups, they are super tasty too! That Captain Loui sauce is like crack, I want to slather it over everything, it‚Äôs so delicious. Def a messy but great meal.
Great service. The seasoning is delicious, big portions. Recommend 10/10
Amazing seafood boil! Great flavor, big portions, and friendly service. Highly recommend!

Clean place with good service. We visited on a weekend afternoon and there was plenty of space.  Food was good - just to note they use top neck clams if you order that option for the boil which can be chewy for little ones.  Other than that, we were happy with our food.  Garlic butter noods were a hit for our fam. Drinks are good and good options if you don‚Äôt want the seafood boil.
The service is so good...seafood boil is the best.

Staff are very good service
Food very. Good.
Got food in a timely manner the food was great 10/10 will come back
Garlic noodle is the best!
The food was phenomenal. Well seasoned and cooked to perfection. The service was prompt and warm. Also, the tunes were impeccable.

The ONLY reason I‚Äôm leaving a 5 Star review is literally the impeccable service from Ian. I follow this place on Instagram and have been so excited to come finally try this place since moving to Sunnyside recently. I came on Tuesday, for their $1.50 oysters and ended up ordering 2 dozen, great value! I ordered a bottle of wine after trying to order a martini, haha, bummer, no bar here, and NO BYOB‚Ä¶ yikes.  So $35 for a bottle of cheap Chardonnay, ok, that‚Äôs still pretty great value. (Just don‚Äôt come alone as a single woman) hopefully you have someone to share it with because they don‚Äôt sell wine by the glass here. Now, to the big order! I ordered 3 lbs of seafood‚Ä¶ or did I? I‚Äôm a southerner, so I was looking forward to this seafood crawfish and seafood boil place since that‚Äôs my favorite, their competition is LITERALLY Nextdoor at the weirdly titled ‚ÄòMad for Chicken‚Äô, that has the best fabulous seafood boils, tasty, and at great value. I say this because it took me awhile to come in here with the atmosphere from the streets looking in, always bright lights (like a cafeteria) and empty, if there is people, it‚Äôs usually small children in addition. Now that I finally came in, I love the soundtracks of music, all the best songs you want to sing along to!

But let‚Äôs get to the food: I‚Äôm including a receipt and pictures of food. I ordered 3 lbs of seafood. I DEFINITELY DIDN'T RECEIVE 3 LBS OF SEAFOOD, BUT I CERTAINLY GOT THE BILL. $243.11

The King Crab that I am paying $115.47 for 1 lb. What is a good price for king crab per pound? As of 2024, the king crab price per pound typically ranges between $30 and $60, depending on the size, quality, and where it's purchased. These prices reflect the costs for the red king crab variety, which is the most commonly consumed and highly prized. My $1115.47 came out in shreds and at parts were so discolored; that is telling of EXPIRED OLD VERY OLD FROZEN KING CRAB, the only reason it could be that old is because not everyone comes in here and orders a pound of the ridiculously pricey crab, I did, and unfortunately it was a complete disappointment. I grew up on the gulf, so I hope you can understand my palate and love for seafood and its value is expert. I LIVE FOR SEAFOOD.

Moving onto the half a pound of clams that only came with four in the bag! Again, FOUR CLAMS to equal half a pound! It was a bad note.
The half a pound of scallops were absolutely incredible, thank goodness!
Finally, I ordered 1 pound of crawfish. ü¶û They were so old and barely had any meat in them. They were shriveled up, and I can tell you that was not a whole pound of crawfish, not even close. I feel jipped and absolutely robbed by the greedy owners of this place.
Next-door when I order at the Mad Chicken, I can have leftovers from this kind of order of 3 lbs of seafood!!!
So I can tell you, I enjoyed what I enjoyed here, and I made it very thorough with my feedback and clarified what that was here, so  now I know one day a week of when to come here and who to ask for and what to order.

My total with $50 tip to the incredible IAN who should be working in a Michelin Star Restaurant, he‚Äôs superb!
Total: $243.11 + Tip= 293.11
NEVER AGAIN.

Management: DO BETTER!
#Greed
Great flavors and spice level, fresh seafood, attentive staff. Had a great dinner!
The calamari and the shrimp with their homemade cajun was amazingly delicious. A little bit too spicy but overall this place is great.
The seafood boil is super flavor and the shrimp poboy is amazing.
The best seafood boil I‚Äôve had in the city.
It was nice

The best seafood boil!! Eaten here more than 5x already and it‚Äôs always consistent. The 2lb combo is my go-to with capt loui sauce. Service is amazing. Place is clean. No foul seafood smell. Items are reasonably priced. I miss their $1 oyster Tuesdays!!
Great Food
Gud
Amazing service! The food was great and very fresh! The prices were not bad for seafood boil
This is a great place to eat lunch. Service was great and fast.
Amazing customer service! Alex is super attentive & polite
Food was delicious and I will definitely come back.

We came here for Sunday brunch. It was pretty easy to get seating. Recommended items: mussels, clams, snow crab legs, and sausage side

They have dollar oysters on Tuesday and BOGO lobster on Thursday!

I absolutely loved my visit to this seafood boil restaurant! I ordered two pounds of shrimp and crayfish, and everything was perfectly cooked ‚Äî fresh, juicy, and packed with flavor. The seasoning was amazing. I also loved that they give you a free side when you order two pounds or more ‚Äî such a great deal! The corn and potatoes were soaked with all that rich sauce and tasted incredible. The staff were super friendly and checked in often to make sure everything was perfect. It‚Äôs the kind of place that makes you want to roll up your sleeves and just dig in.
So incredibly delicious and super, super helpful + friendly staff!!!! Absolutely worth a visit, will be back!!
Food was delicious. Highly recommend!!!!!
Super amazing food and great service by Sumita!!
Delicious! Sumita was great :)

Had an amazing dining experience! The seafood was fresh and flavorful, and the sauces were a perfect complement. The desserts were also incredibly delicious. Great location and top-notch service made it a wonderful evening out with friends.
‚ÄúYou guys should definitely try the buy-one-get-one lobster deal every Thursday ‚Äî it‚Äôs totally worth it! Also, I really liked the service from Susmita.‚Äù

Excellent place. Excellent staff. Seafood is fresh! I have the dungeness crab and head on shrimp.
Would come back again and again. Glad to have this place in the area.
Fresh! Food is amazing. Lobster tail + snow crab with potatoes and corn. Garlic bread is out of this world. Service is spot in. Definitely try their adult capri sun. Will definitely return.
The food is amazing , amazing service and guidance . The spice is spot on with the crab and shrimp. Definitely recommend coming stop by !!
large space with loads of options and quick service!
Great food ! Nice attention by Gared.

Superb! Captain Loui is amazing! This is the 4th time I‚Äôve been here! The seafood is super fresh and full of flavor. I got the shrimp boil with calamari it was so good! The staff is super friendly, the place is clean, and the vibe is fun. Definitely coming back again!
first time eating this and flavor was really good
Love it so much food so delicious lobster rolls outstanding the service was great very friendly

The ü¶ûü¶êüåΩü•¶ seafood boils with a mild Cajun flavor were spot-on. All the employees, including the manager Alex, were kind and attentive. The wide, high ceilings and spacious atmosphere made the experience well worth it for both the flavor and the vibe.  I really like quiet atmosphere so I can have conversation with my friend.
Very good and yummy! Food is amazing and the best ever :)
Truly one of the best experiences! The restaurant itself is great! Clean and feels lively. The food is seasoned so good! I definitely recommend
The sauce was really good

Food was good.

Service was great. Staff was friendly and attentive.
Came to have lunch and wow was I pleasantly surprised! Not only was the food good but the service was fantastic!! The waiter, Gared, rocked!!!
The food here is delicious and the service is incredible! Our server Gared was super respectful, prompt, and kind! Definitely recommend for your next seafood craving!
Super clean place good vibes food is super good nice employees very helpful
Audrey is very nice
Delicious
Great food, great staff and great service! ü§©

Had an amazing seafood meal here. The lobster and calamari were cooked perfectly ‚Äì fresh, tasty, and full of flavor. The cold beer was the perfect match. Great food, nice atmosphere, and friendly service. Definitely a place worth coming back to!

First time dining at Cap‚Äôt Loui Seafood Boil and I‚Äôm impressed! ü¶Äü¶êü¶™
The seafood was super fresh, the seasoning was flavorful and really soaked in, especially their signature sauce‚Äîit‚Äôs addictive. Service was friendly and the atmosphere felt cozy, perfect for family or friends. The garlic bread was also a hit! Definitely coming back whenever I crave seafood boil.‚Äù

Start with the boils being delicious! The meat on all the options was as expected and did not fall short in any way. The house Cajun blend was fire, and even the hot spice was perfect. Service was great and can‚Äôt beat Thursdays but one get one free lobster deal!

First time visiting this new restaurant that just opened up in Sunnyside. Don‚Äôt come here unless you don‚Äôt want to get your hands dirty (gloves are provided tho to help with that).

We ordered the Boiler bag combo; headless shrimp, and muscles, with potatoes and corn included in the sauces. You get to choose your spice level.

You get your very own cute bibs while you eat.

Nice open space.

Looking forward to seeing what this place will turn into. Looking forward to more drink options and the bar service.

Will come again.

Where do I begin. The food is sooooo delicious I had the Po boy sandwich and it was so goo nice crispy shrimp. Also the seafood pasta the seasoning was out of this world. Will definitely be coming back. The stag are also super nice and accommodating

I had an amazing experience at Cap‚Äôt Loui Seafood Boil! From the moment we walked in, the service was exceptional. The atmosphere was fun and relaxed, perfect for enjoying a seafood feast. What really made our visit special was the outstanding service from Cho and Amy. Both of them were incredibly friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu. They made sure we had everything we needed and checked in on us throughout the meal with genuine care. The food came out hot and full of flavor ‚Äî the seasoning was spot on! I highly recommend Cap‚Äôt Loui if you're looking for delicious seafood and top-notch service. Thanks again to Cho and Amy for making our night memorable!

Prices are decent. Food was good. Service was good. All in all if you love seafood boil restaurants, you should come visit. I did the two pound combo, with a free side. It was plenty for one person. Will be coming back for sure.

Another gen in the neighborhood!!
Recently opened, this place is a must go..!
Tried some of their lunch specials (which was a steal) and let me tell you it was great.
The french fries and the sweet potatoes were on point..
The place is really nice, clean and the service on point.
Have to definitely go back and try their variety on the menu.

This was our 2nd time coming here on a Saturday, and the food hits every single time! Fresh, flavorful, and cooked perfectly that‚Äôs exactly why we keep coming back. Our server, Amy, was amazing, super friendly, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed. The atmosphere is lively but still comfortable, perfect for enjoying a seafood feast. Capt Loui Seafood Boil never disappoints!

We were really looking forward to dining at this seafood restaurant after reading so many positive reviews, but unfortunately, we left very disappointed.

We ordered one of the combo meals, which clearly stated it includes corn on the cob and potatoes. For our order, we chose broccoli as the side, along with 1 lb of headless shrimp, 1/2 lb of clams, and 1/2 lb of crawfish.

Shortly after, the waiter came to inform us that they didn‚Äôt have enough clams and offered to replace them with more shrimp, which we were totally fine with. But when the food was served, things quickly went downhill.

First of all, the corn and potato portions were laughable. We received half of a mini corn cob, literally smaller than my pinky finger, and half of a tiny potato ‚Äì and I mean tiny. We politely asked the waiter if this was correct, and even he couldn‚Äôt hold back a smirk when he saw the portion. But then he said that‚Äôs how they always serve it ‚Äì one potato and half a corn. When we asked again, pointing out that it wasn‚Äôt even a whole mini potato, he simply repeated that this was their standard.

He didn‚Äôt offer to bring us another piece or make up for it in any way, which was really disappointing. We‚Äôre paying good money for seafood, and they‚Äôre cutting corners on potatoes and corn? That felt like a bad joke.

From that moment on, the service felt off. The waiter avoided us, never checked in to ask if we needed drinks or anything else. We were polite the entire time, so this treatment felt even more disrespectful. It was like we were no longer welcome.

As for the seafood itself ‚Äì it didn‚Äôt meet expectations either. The shrimp were small, definitely not what 1 lb usually looks like. We‚Äôve been traveling the East Coast from Key West to New York and had this exact type of dish multiple times, so we know what to expect in terms of portion size. Here, it felt more like a starter than a full meal.

He had promised us 5‚Äì6 extra shrimp to make up for the missing clams but only brought 3 head-on shrimp, even though we ordered head-off shrimp. The 3 clams we did receive were actually tasty, but just 3 pieces is hardly anything.

The broccoli was bland, completely unseasoned ‚Äì not even a hint of salt.

Now to the only positive note: the sauce. It was actually delicious, full of flavor and spice ‚Äì but sadly, we had nothing to enjoy it with. The portions were so small, and the sides almost nonexistent, that the sauce ended up being wasted.

After all of this, we even wanted to order some noodles to try to salvage the meal, but the waiter was nowhere to be found and clearly ignored us. At that point, we gave up.

In the end, we shared our concerns with another server, as the original waiter never came back. Thankfully, she was kind and at least understood our frustration, but the damage was already done.

We were truly looking forward to this meal, and sadly, we left disappointed ‚Äì both in the food quality and the way we were treated. Not a place we would return to or recommend.

I love Capt Loui! I ordered the king crab and it was damn good‚Äîtotally worth it. The only downside was the service; the server didn‚Äôt really pay much attention to the customers. On the plus side, they have mouthwash in the restroom, which is a nice touch.
Seafood was super fresh and packed with flavor! The seasoning was perfect, and the mix of shrimp, crawfish, corn, and sausage hit the spot. Fun, messy, and delicious ‚Äî can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Have visited other Cap't Loui locations and this one definitely has been the nicest overall. The vibe is great , the place looks really nice and the neighborhood is quite nice. The service and food were exactly what we've come to expect from Cap't Loui. Fresh,  well seasoned and delicious.  We will definitely visit this location again.   Special shout out to our servers Audrey and Susmita for making my partner's birthday special!!!!
I brought my aunt here to get her seafood boil and she enjoyed it!. Nice atmosphere and good service!. I will definitely come here again.

We had a fantastic birthday lunch here! The boil was fantastic, love the lobster tails,  the calamari and mussels. Sides of fries and corn great.
Staff was lovely as well!

Finally a seafood boil in the neighborhood! I‚Äôm gonna get so fat. Had a good introduction last night. Got the hot Cajun seasoning. Was a nice bit of heat! The flavors are wonderful. Corn is corn. Nothing going on with it. Good New England clam chowder. Also nothing incredible but it‚Äôs what you want in a chowder. The menu is loyal to the Cajun theme with po boy sandwiches and some drinks served in a pouch. Prices seemed fair. Especially lunch specials.
I had the lunch special! Overall taste good, the sauce is very flavorful. Next time I'll prob skip the clams and try something else! Have tons of seats and very clean!

Love the seafood boil with crab and shrimp. The price is fair and I like how they have the option for half a pound of anything. I just always request the captain Loui sauce less sweet. Customer service is outstanding.

My partner surprised me on my birthday üéÇ today with a marvelous and tasty boil at this establishment.  We have been to others, but this by far surpasses expectations in service, atmosphere,  location and most especially the food.  We found the food to be fresh, tasty and delicious.  Waitresses (Sasmita and Audrey) were attentive, warm, welcoming, respectful of our space and professional.  I definitely recommend this restaurant and more visits will be made in the near future.
Great place.  Really new, so the masses don‚Äôt know about it yet.  Perfect $1 oysters on Tuesdays.  Great sides, and even better service.  Was a fun dinner!  Will be back for sure!!!
We were craving some Cajun seafood and found capt loui nearby. wish I found this place earlier. Food was fresh and super delicious and the staff was very nice. We‚Äôd definitely wanna come back
Food was delicious! Ian was extremely attentive, quick and efficient! I would definitely come back here again with the family!

It was my first time trying seafood boil in the queens area and it was an amazing experience! The sauce was so flavorful, the seafood was fresh and hot and even the side dishes were delicious! The garlic noodles were ü§å

Tried Cap‚Äôt Loui in my neighborhood and was seriously impressed! The seafood boil was superb‚Äîflavorful, fresh, and perfectly cooked. The garlic bread was crispy and buttery, and the garlic noodles were packed with flavor. Everything hit the spot. Definitely a new go-to for seafood cravings!

Amazing service! This location is very spacious. We got the seafood boil, soup which was good. The fish & chips & noodles could be better.Cajun Fries & the sauce was fire!!üî•BEST FUNNEL CAKE FRIES OMG!
First time here for a seafood boil and had a great experience! The seafood was fresh and flavorful, the service was friendly, and the space was clean and comfortable. Definitely coming back!

I ordered the crab legs with garlic noodles, and they were super fresh and perfectly cooked. The sauce had the right amount of kick, and the portion was generous. Overall, a great experience! Definitely coming back for another seafood boil soon :)
Loved the food so much! Our waitress Audrey was super sweet and helpful. Mussels were my favorite, can‚Äôt wait to come again.

This seafood boil exceeded my expectations. Friendly staff, cozy atmosphere and super clean. The food was incredibly delicious. Highly recommend!
Definitely be back for more üòç
the food was so good, the staff was very nice and helped us with everything. this was our second time coming here and it was great. we will be coming back again !

Me and my friend want to try seafood boil but no idea what to eat, Mrs.Susmita (staff) made the great choice for us.
If you're craving a flavorful seafood boil, this is a solid choice. The seafood is fresh, and the seasoning options are generous and tasty. The casual, lively atmosphere makes it perfect for a fun, A great spot for seafood lovers looking for a hearty meal!
The food was delicious and the service was great. A really good spot to come out to. Highly recommend!

Truly truly truly amazing. The sauce the side dishes the atmosphere the service the tables the chairs the napkins the sprite the cup the floor the walls. Everything was outstanding and don‚Äôt forget to mention the food. Our waitress was extremely kind and offered us many options whenever we struggled to find something that could calm our hunger.

CAP‚ÄôT LOUI SEA FOOD was exceptional, friendly, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. Our server (susmita) made perfect recommendations, and every detail was spot-on. The food was delicious, beautifully presented, and arrived promptly. A truly memorable dining experienc we will definitely be back!

I was really excited to try the Capt Loui in Sunnyside since I used to love the Fort Lee location back when I lived in NJ‚Äîthe food there was always super fresh. Now living in Sunnyside, I had high hopes. Unfortunately, the corn on the cob (see photo) was disappointing, the food lacked flavor, and the garlic in the sauce didn‚Äôt taste fresh. On the plus side, the service was great.

The seafood boil was absolutely delicious‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. ‚ÄúI want to specifically recognize Alex Who took care of our table.Alex was amazing! He was so attentive, polite, and made sure we had everything we needed. His service really made our seafood boil experience even better. Thank you, Alex!‚Äù
First time here. Food is freaking bombbbb so good, it‚Äôs ‚Äúreally in the sauce ‚Äú. I love the service here, get the lemon pepper fries. BEASTEDDDD

Capt Loui has amazing seafood with generous portions and bold flavors. The sauces are rich and customizable to your spice level, and the seafood always tastes fresh. The atmosphere is casual and fun, perfect for a group dinner. Definitely a go-to spot if you love seafood boils!
Fresh seafood and it tasted amazing! Wide random of seafood options, super cute place and great service.

my partner & i went for the lunch special and everything was so delish omg! i‚Äôm not crazy on seafood so i got chicken tenders and fries and that was really good too, but i tried some of my partner‚Äôs seafood and it was just all soooo good. we will definitely come back! üòÑ
